2025-02-12.title: Cisco Gains After AI-Fueled Networking Spending Lifts Forecast
2025-02-12.description: Cisco Systems Inc. gained in late trading after giving an upbeat sales forecast for the current quarter, helped by companies spending more on computing infrastructure to take advantage of AI technology.
